verbose_text: Mizuno et al suggested that IFN-gamma synergistically enhances glutamate neurotoxicity mediated by alpha-amino-3-hy droxy-5-methyl-4-isoxazolepropionic acid (AMPA) receptors, but not NMDA receptors.
evidence: mediated by alpha-amino-3-hy droxy-5-methyl-4-isoxazolepropionic acid (AMPA) receptors, but not NMDA receptors
